text: is there any way that I can create a custom version of the a HubSpot CTA (beta)? It looks like my team wants to use the CTA buttons to get their analytics benefits but our button hover state is too complicated to be represented in the editor
has anyone ever tried to include "viewed" as a parameter in custom behavioral events? I wonder if I can have an event trigger based on it a button being in the view and then also track clicks on it
